overview:
George Schneider is a Graphic Designer and Internet Marketer.

For more than 10 years George Schneider has been in the Graphic Design and Marketing industries. He has served on marketing teams, as an in-house Graphic Designer and developed many SEO campaigns for various clients.

In the beginning of his career he focused on print design, while in later years has turned more towards the web. He created GS4 Media as a portfolio to showcase his Graphic Design work and developed the GS4 Media Blog to help business and website owners with SEO related topics.
